You were born with the soul of the endless, and you
yearn for freedom to push your creativity to
Your cunning was put to the test in the harshest possible
enviroment. You were born and soon abandoned in the capital
You had to choose at a very young age to either become a
pickpocket, a burglar or try to struggle and lead an honest
Your life spent learning thievery certainly didn't go to
waste. You learned to live with the constant fear and danger
around you. The crude streets of Jettaiah taught you
Your life spent learning thievery certainly didn't go to
waste. You learned to live with the constant fear and danger
The crude streets of Jettaiah taught you
You struggled through your early life, but managed to get
by as a merchant of sorts. Your skills of haggling and
speech improved over the years and you also managed to
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[10]: However your endless soul yearned for more...
You couldn't just become a family man, grow fat and make
a living as a mere merchant. You were destined for more.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[11]: As you grew older you joined up with various mercenary armies
and learned the dirtiest tricks to stay alive. You were taken
in by a notorious veteran highwayman and you joined his little
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[12]: During one of your many raids, your brigade got ambushed.
The odds were seriously against you. You could have just
abandoned your comrades and kept you life, or you could have
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[15]: Not many survived the ambush, but that just meant a bigger cut
of the mission rewards. You were one of the lucky
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[17]: You traveled across the land in your raids and eventually
settled down in the Kingdom of Rondon where silver was
loose as long as you were up for getting your knife dirty.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[18]: One day you got an ominous task from the officials of the
kingdom. You are to be paid well in silver if you get the
captain of a fabled mercenary army out of the dungeons
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[19]: From the dungeons of Fear and Hunger. The morbid place has
been used as a wartime prison by the kingdom and for some
reason they need an outside sword like yourself to infiltrate
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[20]: Something is clearly not right about this mission and you
have felt nauseua since the the moment you agreed to
take the job. But you are short on silver and
the reward is all that matters in the end.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[21]: You spent your last night in the kingdom...
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[22]: Go drinking and get laid at the brothel
Stock up food for the mission
Stock up healing items for the mission
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[23]: You get a \c[2]Wine vial\c[0], a \c[2]Bottle of whiskey\c[0]
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[24]: You also get an itch in your groin area...
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[25]: You get 3 \c[2]Dried meat\c[0], a \c[2]Moldy bread\c[0] and
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[26]: You get a \c[2]Blue vial\c[0] and 2 \c[2]Cloth fragments\c[0].
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[28]: This really is your biggest job ever. There is a person
back in the city relying on you to return with riches. You
have heard rumors about this place and you are sure that
there are great treasures hidden somewhere in these ruins...
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[29]: So even if the mission were to go south for some reason,
you are not going to return empty handed.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[30]: You were born with the soul of the tormented. You are
destined to struggle in every step you take in life.
Ultimately this makes you stronger physically and tempers
your iron will until it rivals that of the gods themselves.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[31]: You had a normal childhood in the city of Oldegård with
both of your parents always present. Your father taught you
in the art of war. The very first step was to choose your
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[34]: You get an \c[2]Axe\c[0] and a \c[2]Wooden buckler\c[0].
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[35]: Winters grew colder and summers shorter, causing
a great hunger in the north. The fine men of the Oldegård
set sails to the unknown west in a desperate attempt to
find food and riches to feed their people.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[36]: You had grown into your manhood and boarded the ship.
After months of sailing, the sea saw no end and the crew
was struggling. Some laid weak under the deck while some
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[37]: As the weak met their fate, the rest indulged in the greatest
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[40]: Eventually you lost your mind to the hunger. While the
others feasted on the fallen, you cried the night on the
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[42]: As if the trip wasn't gloomy enough, when you finally found
land it was something no one in the civilized world could've
ever imagined. On the very edge of the world you found
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[43]: A continent never touched by civilized man.
The land was tainted by ancient deities and gods you had
never even heard of. The things you witnessed there left a
mark on you that could never be washed away.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[44]: Some of your comrades lost their minds while others tried to
pillage anything worthwhile before leaving the macabre place.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[45]: Don't touch anything and flee back to your ship
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[49]: Unfortunately the relics you brought from the trip were tainted
and you became fearful of everything around you.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[52]: Unfortunately the relics you brought from the trip were tainted
and you became afraid of everything around you.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[53]: One artefact taken from the dark continent was different.
You knew it was a mistake to bring along, but the choice wasn't
yours. You knew something bad would follow sooner or
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[54]: The bad omens would soon reveal themselves, as one week after
your return, after one of your many hunting trips, you came
back to your village only to witness your worst fears come
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[55]: A mercenary army had raided your village.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[56]: You witnessed your home burning, your family slain,
and the artefact stolen. Those who survived the raid
described the army and its captain.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[57]: He was commander of the fabled mercenary army,
the Knights of the Midnight Sun. You immediately grabbed
your weapon and began after him.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[58]: The man would witness an iron will tempered both in the
freezing north and the dark continent of Vinland.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[60]: You get 3 \c[2]Iron arrows\c[0] and a \c[2]Bear trap\c[0].
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[61]: You get a \c[2]Dried meat\c[0], a \c[2]Moldy bread\c[0] and
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[62]: You get \c[2]4 Blue herbs\c[0], a \c[2]White vial\c[0] and
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[64]: You learned that the man had since been taken captive by the
King of Rondon. He was sent to the notorious
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[65]: You set your mind - You will kill everything that carries
a dark soul in the dungeons. You will have your revenge,
and the dark artefact will be yours again. There is no
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[66]: You were born with the soul of domination that
bends others to your will. You are a natural leader,
but are often blind to your own flaws.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[67]: If your birth sign wasn't enough to warrant a future of
greatness, you were also born into a wealthy noble family.
At an early age you were sent away to become
a Holy Knight of the Kingdom of Rondon.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[68]: The training was bitterly harsh, and spared no one.
It did not matter if you were of noble origin.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[69]: A practice sparring match between you and a well-seasoned
squire took place at the central training grounds.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[70]: It is said that a fighter shows their true colors in their
first fight. This applied to you too. When you saw the
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[71]: Quickly stepped aside and dodged it
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[74]: As time went on, you proved to be a gifted fighter and
a valuable asset to the kingdom. However...
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[75]: The Kingdom of Rondon claimed to follow the will of the
gods in its many campaigns. But all the rewards
seemed to fall into the laps of the elites and the nobles
sitting comfortably behind their castle walls.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[76]: Ruthlessly, the kingdom expanded its reach.
Reducing feeble citadels to ashes and blood stains.
Enslaving the poor women, killing the men,
and only sparing children for sport.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[77]: Your devotion was shaken. You were all but ready to retire
from the army, but your family insisted - no, demanded
you stay a holy knight, lest you bring great
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[78]: Break ties with your family and run away.
Listen to your family and stay a holy knight.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[79]: You realize they're strangers to you, and you cut
ties with your family without hesitation.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[80]: Just as you were about to flee from the army, things took
an unexpected turn for you. You met a captain of a small
mercenary army who seemed to share the same ill-will towards
the Kingdom of Rondon as you did.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[81]: You swallowed your grief and doubt and decided to stay
a holy knight. You could fix the army's conduct
from the inside, you naively thought.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[82]: Your family thanks you with a gift of \c[2]20 Silver coins\c[0].
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[83]: Just as things seemed too dark, you saw light in the
darkness. You met a captain of a small mercenary army who
seemed to share the same ill-will towards the Kingdom of
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[84]: The common folk were starting to gather around the
charismatic leader Le'garde, who shared their humble origin.
He was hero to farmers and villagers alike. There was
definitely something otherworldy in his stature.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[85]: Le'garde saw potential in you, and with warm words, he
seduced you into joining his band of mercenaries.
Thanks to your rigorous discipline, you took a high position
in his army, in the Knights of the Midnight Sun.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[86]: Your army was quickly growing in both size and influence.
At first, the Kingdom of Rondon hired your
band for their own ends, but before long, they saw you as
a possible threat to their sovereignty.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[87]: Something changed with Le'garde as well. He kept more to
himself, studying ancient texts and the occult. He became
obsessed with relics and artefacts that gave you ominous
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[88]: Things would only spiral further towards madness when
Le'garde decided to raid the northern capital, Oldegård.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[89]: Without warning or negotiation, Le'garde ordered the attack.
All who stood between him and a peculiar, mysterious
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[90]: It was this final act that was used by
the Kingdom of Rondon to turn the commoners against
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[91]: As the troops of Rondon marched towards your
clearly smaller army, you had to choose a position
to take in the coming encounter.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[92]: Take the rear and manage defenses.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[93]: You get a \c[2]Long sword\c[0] and an \c[2]Eagle crest shield\c[0].
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[94]: You get also get a \c[2]Plate mail\c[0] and \c[2]Leg guards\c[0].
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[96]: You get also get a \c[2]Iron cuirass\c[0] and \c[2]Arm guards\c[0].
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[97]: The Knights of the Midnight Sun lost the fight.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[98]: Many of your comrades were slain, but you managed to escape
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[99]: Le'garde was taken captive to be summarily tortured
and executed as propaganda for the state.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[100: You knew you didn't have much time before he would be
sentenced to death, so you had to act fast.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[101: Even if it seemed like a suicide mission, you decided to
save Le'garde from the prisons he was held in.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[102: Before leaving for your desperate journey, you decided
to stock up on equipment and items...
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[105: You get 3 \c[2]Dried meat\c[0], a \c[2]Moldy bread\c[0] and
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[107: The dungeons open before you. You won't leave these ruins
without Le'garde. One way or another, you two will be
reunited. Even if it requires you to give up
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[108: You were born with the soul of the enlightened. You are
always seeking restlessly for new knowledge and secrets
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[109: You were born one of two twins, and recognizing an omen,
you were both chosen to become dark priests
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[110: As part of an occult rite, you were pitted against your
sibling with ritual daggers and challenged to fight each
other to the very last breath.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[111: Unfortunately for you, you were born with a fragile body
and your sister easily overpowered you, her dagger
on your neck waiting for the final blow.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[112: She, however, showed mercy and withdrew her dagger.
She stepped away from you as your high priest masters glared
at the event unfolding before their eyes.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[113: Strike your dagger into her spine while she walks away
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[114: You struck your dagger into the spine of your sister and she
collapsed to the ground. The high priests seemed especially
pleased with this and prepared you for your ascension
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[115: In the ascension ceremony you were to resurrect your
deceased sister with necromancy and use her as a ghoul.
You did this, and the cold corpse of your sister brought
a smile to your otherwise emotionless face.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[117: After your ascension to dark priesthood, you were to leave
the temple grounds and learn the occult on your own
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[118: The dark priests had no pity for the weak, so you were
thrown down an underground well. There you were meant
to quietly wither away. Instead you fed on insects and other
creatures that shared your fate down in the darkness.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[119: With time you learned to understand the language they
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[120: With the aid of your new slaves, you eventually grew strong
enough to climb up the well. You crept upstairs to the
temple and found it quiet as the night above.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[121: Quietly leave and run away without revenge
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[122: Vengefully, you strike back at your caretakers. You set the temple on
fire, jam the exit door so no one can escape and then
vanish. Only muffled screams can be heard coming from
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[124: You quietly left the temple area. After all, revenge
wouldn't solve anything. But in order to make sure you'd
survive on your own, you took a few precious tomes with you.
Your path forward had been laid.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[126: After leaving the temple grounds, you vowed to become a
dark priest on your own merits and prove the elders wrong.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[127: Like all priests, you first had to choose
the god you'd dedicate your life to.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[128: Pray to God of the Depths
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[129: You traveled across the western continent, learning about
different gods, demons, blood magic, and all known sciences.
Your studies didn't come without their merits. You were
acknowledged by the top scholars in the world.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[130: You were finally granted a pass to the great libraries
of the Kingdom of Rondon. You now had the collection of
all human history and science at your grasp.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[131: There, you learned of a prophecy: a man would soon ascend,
signalling the birth of a new era for mankind. But why?
Why this meaningless mortal? What did the fates intend?
In the end, it hardly mattered.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[132: Prophecies are only for those weak enough to bend the knee
to the mocking fates. You will find this man and claim
your destiny. You set off towards your destination:
The notorious Dungeons of Fear & Hunger.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[133: You decided to stock up before your travels.
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[137: You get a \c[2]Blue vial\c[0] and 2 \c[2]Cloth fragments\c[0].
Map073.Event[4].Page[1].list.message[139: This is it. Your stairway to enlightenment. You will
discover the ancient secrets this stronghold keeps and
attain the ultimate understanding of the cosmos
Save your character info before starting the game?
